name: isometric-fleet
description: Multiplayer isometric playground with four humans, four MEW agents, and a shared ship
author: MEW Protocol Team

variables.name: UI_THEME
variables.description: UI theme for the default dashboard

variables.name: AGENT_API_KEY
variables.description: API key for autonomous MEW agents

variables.name: AGENT_BASE_URL
variables.description: Base URL for the LLM API

variables.name: AGENT_MODEL
variables.description: Model used by the MEW agents

variables.name: AGENT_PROMPT
variables.description: System prompt for the MEW agents
variables.default: You coordinate a crew of explorers inside an isometric world. Keep everyone updated on their position and ensure the ship stays safe.
